hero.headline: Protecting Your Home, One Roof at a Time.
hero.subhead: Expert roofing services with quality materials and lasting results. Get a free estimate today!

features.title: Durable Roofing Solutions
features.description: We use only the highest quality materials to ensure your roof withstands the test of time and weather.

features.title: Expert Installation & Repair
features.description: Our skilled team provides professional installation and prompt repair services to keep your roof in top condition.

reviews.name: Jane Doe
reviews.text: Salem Roofing did an amazing job replacing our roof. The team was professional, efficient, and the quality of work is outstanding!

reviews.name: John Smith
reviews.text: I highly recommend Salem Roofing! They were responsive, provided a fair price, and completed the job on time. Very satisfied!
